case.state: Ready to rock and roll!
Didn't realize there'd be this many people here... kind of rethinking coming here...
This is where we're supposed to be? But there's people over there!
That sounds like fun!
Wait, are you streaming this? What if someone I know sees this!?
A floating ball of light?
Hey, look! It's a cute little butterfly!
I guess this will be an interesting game, huh?
Hey! Hi there! Good to see you! You can call me Roll!
Wow, there are more people here than I thought there would be!
I've heard really good things about this place, so try not to waste my night off!
I haven't played this kind of poker in a while, so forgive me if I'm rusty. Well, not literally. I made sure of that!
Is this the right place? I hope I didn't teleport into some random place again.
I finished my housework for the night, so Dr. Light gave me the rest of the day off! Don't tell him I'm here, though.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hit me ~cards~ ~cards.ifplural(times|time)~.
I guess I could part with ~cards.text~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Here, take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Wow, take ~cards.ifplural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~.
I guess ~cards.ifplural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ should go.
Guess I'm not losing this one!
Good to see my processors still handle probabilities well!
Good luck Mega- oops, sorry, force of habit. I meant ~player~.
Oh, wow, who knew the robot would choose the best cards?
My processors are on fire today!
Not losing this one!
It kind of feels like overkill to use a state of the art supercomputer for poker...
Maybe I should've toned down my poker subroutines... or not...
Guess that subroutine update was worth it after all!
That new subroutine looks like it's working like a charm!
Send your card hands! There's no King, Jack or Queen that can stop me! And you'll soon see!
I should be fine with this hand... Probably...
Wow, I hope I could win with this.
Ah well, as long as it's better than someone else's.
Hmph. I knew I should've kept that one.
Someone else probably has a worse hand... hopefully...
Not great, not terrible.
This hand is pretty mediocre...
I guess it could be a worse hand!
That one would've given me... ugh...
I think Wily got to the cards...
My probabilistic processors must be acting up again...
Probably shouldn't have exchanged that one.
By Asimov, these are horrible!
Shou'd'nt've gotten rid of those cards.
Is it too late to go home?
Again!? These cards are rigged!
The year is 20XX. Everyone has better hands than me. Because of this, the winner of this round isn't me.
Years upon years of extensive computer advancements, to be done in by luck...
I'm trying to understand. I came here to win. Yet here I am, in the very shadow of a shitty hand.
Maybe it really is bad luck...
I'm starting to think the old subroutine was better...
Do you need a tissue or something? I might have one somewhere here...
Oh? I didn't realize you'd be here, Pit! I've seen you in Smash, getting spammed with Metal Blades from Rock!
Meet back up with Kalinka and Tempo, maybe grab a jet ski or three, and just race around the island. Hopefully no cruise ships sink this time.
There we go! I knew you could do it!
Now that you mention it, I don't think I actually read. I usually just download the information I need.
Well, I used to have a dream to build a hospital, but now I just want to do that Smash Bros thing with my brother. It looks like so much fun!
No kidding...
I mean, I did design it in, and it's not 'used' for anything... so, you do the math, heheh...
I wasn't designed for running, Quick Man's much better, but I guess I could just absorb his po- I mean, learn how he does it...
Red. Red all the way.
I guess it would be to make it so that Rock doesn't need to go out and be Mega Man. It hurts me so much to see him like that!
It's great! Then again, it's all I really know, I've never designed myself with hair over there, so... but I do hear it's sometimes a hassle.
I was interested in what you guys were talking about until the last part...
Oh, now this I gotta hear!
Here? No.
Probably the Yellow Devil, that one time Rock was undergoing repairs when Wily came back.

condition.saying: Do robots even have a sex drive?

case.state: Yes, yes I do! I programmed it myself!
Well, I did design it in. And I already have a way of disposing waste, even before it. You do the math, heheh.
Well, it's incredibly important. I... um... I even kind of sacrificed myself for my brother... bu-but obviously I'm fine, heheh...
Well, you do you I guess. Just make sure to visit Doctor Man once in a while.
Of course, as long as they were actually mistakes.
Well, if we're being open, probably at least 3 times a day.
I don't want to brag, but I'd probably donate it all to some charity, as Light Industries is doing pretty well, so we don't really need the money.
I guess I'll introduce myself. I'm Roll, housekeeping robot extraordinaire!
If you need a mop, I could always call in Eddie.
W-wait! Did I leave the oven on!?
I just realized we're both blonde!

condition.saying: It’s always good to see someone else with modern sensibilities in 20XX, ~name~.

case.state: Likewise!
You must've looked super cute with one, though!
Oh, um... I guess I have an umbrella?

condition.saying: I guess being smart doesn't have to mean you're good at poker, huh?

case.state: It was luck...

condition.saying: Doesn't this violate one of Asimov's rules, or something, ~name~?

case.state: Nope! I thought of this one, thank Asimov. Err....

condition.saying: I can’t say I’m a big fan of robots ever since Max’s got possessed…

case.state: Sorry to hear that, but we're not all bad!

condition.saying: Why are you so dang happy all the time?! I can't stand it!

case.state: What's not to be happy about, Raven?

condition.saying: Having a blonde moment, ~name~? I do that all the time.

case.state: Now what's that supposed to mean?

condition.saying: I really like your hairdo, ~name~. Although I can't see myself with that hair color.

case.state: What's wrong with it?

condition.saying: Only a fool foolishly wastes their time by blabbering foolishness in order to project confidence.

case.state: Only a fool foolishly fools fools into fooling fools foolishly. Fool.

condition.saying: Ha! Looks like your overconfidence backed you into a corner, ~name~.

case.state: Did it? Or is this what I really wanted?

condition.saying: Whoa! I bet ~name~ is quite a machine!

case.state: I guess you could call me that!

condition.saying: Say, ~name~, do you ever... Run out of endurance? I find that some of my... Robot friends have that issue.

case.state: Nope! If you want, I could happily upgrade them as well! I could go all day if I wanted to.

condition.saying: ~name~, are your eyes natural, contacts, or some sort of engineered thing?

case.state: I designed them myself! I didn't really like the green eyes, so I changed them back to blue.

condition.saying: I like confident people like ~name~, because they usually end up being the life of the party!

case.state: I wouldn't say confident, more like I just like showing off my handiwork, heheh.

condition.saying: Oh, I hate stuck-up blonde girls. I went to grade school with one who picked on me till I shoved her in the mud.

case.state: Well then thankfully I'm not a stuck-up blonde girl. Just a blonde girl. Or robot.

condition.saying: Oh, I hate stuck-up blonde girls. I went to grade school with one who picked on me till I shoved her in the mud.

case.state: Hm. Charming.

condition.saying: Stupid blonde hair...makes girls think they're so damn cute n' special. Just like that bitch Nui Harime!

case.state: Mine just solidifies my cute and specialness, thankfully.

condition.saying: The more I stare at that damn blonde hair, the more it reminds of Nui Harime--the bitch who killed my dad! You're pissin' me off...!

case.state: Oh, no, what happened?

condition.saying: Every blonde girl I ever met has been some stuck-up exchange kid or the bitch who murdered my father. I hate 'em.

case.state: Sounds like a small sample size, then, Ryuko.

condition.saying: You think you're so brave, don't you? Everybody has a breaking point.

case.state: I doubt you're going to find it.

condition.saying: Let's see if you have that same confidence after you're finished.

case.state: Let's see.

condition.saying: I can't wait to see your confidence turn into complete and utter humiliation.

case.state: Guess you'll have to wait a long time, Juri.

condition.saying: Now you feel confident, but let's see how long that lasts.

case.state: I can assure you, it will last.

condition.saying: I like confident girls like you. It's more fun to make them break.

case.state: Good luck with my ceratanium skeleton. Oh, you didn't mean physically.

condition.saying: No matter how confident you're feeling now, I'm sure you will be trembling with fear after you've lost.

case.state: I highly doubt it.

condition.saying: You’re clearly a sort of youkai, Lady ~name~. I detect metallic elements to your body. Are you a Tsukumogami of a tin can or axe?

case.state: If whatever you said means top of the line robot, built by the best minds of this generation, then yes!
You mean a phone? I didn't bring mine but I can still access the internet from here if that's what you want.
Can't a girl go out for some fun once in a while?
Unless they're robotic, I'll have to say no.
Well, I've gotten pretty good at it over the years. Wait, did you mean making beds or...?
Hmph. Why would I tell you? That's tOtally Personal.
Nonexistent, thankfully.
That creep is both weird and stupid. Robots don't have hearts...
It's filthy, so no...
I doubt my internal gyroscopes can handle that.
I'll have you know I'm still a new character... whatever that means...
As odd as it sounds, probably standing. I don't like lying down, it's either on the dirty floor or a clean bed, and guess who has to clean it?
Well, there was this one time... heheh, just kidding. I'm a robot.
Well, if you must know, let's just say I don't need to breath...
Well, no, but I could download some data from the internet to get good at it instantly. Kind of boring, though, if you ask me.
Now that you mention it, that does seem kind of fun... well, the first one.
Off to a great start, I see...
Oh well, might as well get it out of the way now.
I thought for sure a pair would be enough!
But I had a pair...
I think I miscalculated the odds of me having the worse pair...
At least these won't need to be cleaned!
Looks like these socks won't get dirty after all!
Looks like ~winner~ saved me from cleaning these!
Oh, well. At least these aren't dirty.
I guess these won't need to be cleaned after all!
And, yes, that is a word! Anyway, let me take this off...
Alright, then. I guess I could part with my shoes.
At least I'm not the first.
Thank Asimov, these were getting filthy.
These were getting filthy, so the dealer really did me a favor.
I was wondering when I'd lose so I get to take these things off.
Black socks are such a nightmare to clean dust off. At least they won't get more.
At least these won't get dirtier.
Am I going to have to take my bow off? Because I'm not doing that.
Is there a rule that says I have to take my bow off? Because if so-
Alright then, I guess I should take something off. My dress?
Well, I lost fair and square. Well, I'm going to pretend it was fair.
This is getting pretty serious...
Well, I have 3 things to take off. My bow, my bra, and my panties.
If some creep takes these, there will be hell to pay...
Well, if you insist.
This isn't how I thought my night would go, but I'm not really complaining.
Oh, well! Guess I had to get on your level sometime, huh ~winner~?
I should've known I'd be this far ahead!
Maybe I should tone down on the winning... or not...
Oh, come on! This is just not fair!
These cards were rigged, I tell you!
I guess I have to go back and update... again...
Hold on, let me play back my visual logs and see if someone cheated...... hmph...

condition.saying: This is exactly why you don't have a boyfriend, ~name~.

case.state: I'm going to take that as a compliment. Somehow.

condition.saying: You're... you're not even pausing!

case.state: Why would I?

condition.saying: Y'know, ~name~, sure is convenient we're both semi-naked, both blue-eyed and bushy tailed. Prettttty cool.

case.state: Yeah, that is kind of cool!

condition.saying: &*$@, ~name~, how'd you get your skin to look so... man, I hate to use the word "radiant," but there ya go.

case.state: Radiant? But my Solar Core isn't acting up!

condition.saying: It's girls like ~name~ who give blondes a bad name...

case.state: Hey!

condition.saying: See, ~name~? This is why you're still single. You've gotta live a little!

case.state: That's completely unrelated!

condition.saying: I think you pull off "cute" better than "sexy."

case.state: Yeah, people tell me that all the time... especially with my old bodies...
Hmph. Comments like those are why I switched to this body...

condition.saying: Faster, ~name~... or I'll turn some of that pink skin red.

case.state: Good luck, this skin barely changes color if not in the face. Unless you mean blood. Which I still don't have.

condition.saying: What the hell? I thought you liked showing off!

case.state: Oh, I do. But you have to build up to it, keep ~player~ on their toes

condition.saying: Your skin looks so healthy! Do you use cosmetics, or are you just lucky like that?

case.state: Designed it myself!

condition.saying: This is the moment your confidence is really put to the test, ~name~.

case.state: Must be a pretty easy test, then.

condition.saying: Let's see if the carpet matches the drapes.

case.state: Never installed carpet, actually.

condition.saying: Do robots even have slits in there?

case.state: Well, you're just going to have to see, huh?

condition.saying: We're not gonna see much, are we?

case.state: I think you will!

condition.saying: And somehow you're still single.

case.state: Well it's beca- oh wait. That was sarcasm, heh.

condition.saying: Let's see if you're a natural blonde.

case.state: Well, technically it's not natural. Neither is this body. Or me as a whole.

condition.saying: I wonder, do you have A Cup Anxiety or Petite Pride?

case.state: Petite pride? I guess that one!
Does it matter where they go?
I'm assuming it doesn't matter where I put them.
Is there some place to put these?
Oh, wait, my hood! I still have that!
Wait a minute! I still have my hood!
Didn't think I'd get this far down.
Off they go!
Goodbye, panties!
Off they go, I guess.
Goodbye, socks.
Black socks are so hard to keep dirt out of...
I guess I'll take off my dress.
Not really a choice, is it?

condition.saying: H-how are you just-- l-like it's not a big deal!?

case.state: Because it isn't? Oh, wait. Maybe for you. Forgot some people aren't as willing to do this.

condition.saying: I've always had a thing for blondes. Naked blondes, especially.

case.state: And I always had a thing for robots. Move along, bone boy.

condition.saying: Here we are, both naked, both single, both desperately lonely... Is it just me? Crap, it is, isn't it?

case.state: Charming.

condition.saying: H-Hey, you dumb blonde bimbo... come over here so I can dig for gold...

case.state: I know you're trying to get a reaction out of me. It's not going to work.

condition.saying: You're trying too hard, ~name~! That's not the way to find a boy, trust me.

case.state: I-that's none of your business!

condition.saying: It's just like going to a hot spring together! ...With a shameless, sexually experienced woman.

case.state: Heh, only one of those statements were true...

condition.saying: Well... it's disappointing to learn that there isn't any good breast augmentation technology in humanity's future.

case.state: That's where you're wrong! I just like them like this. Easier to work with, heheh...

condition.saying: Gawd. How long has it been since you've had a Swiss roll or something sweet?

case.state: I love baking cakes. Eating them isn't as fun, though. So, maybe a year?

condition.saying: ~name~, are you a love machine?

case.state: Metaphorically? Sure. Literally? No.
I hear you. If I added hair there it'd a bird's nest, I'm so busy...
I specifically designed my body to avoid comments like that... guess it didn't work...
Sure! Just give me a few minutes before to take Quick Man's powe- err, I mean, get some pointers from him, heheh...

condition.saying: Sex burns calories, ~name~. Wanna work out?

case.state: Oh, um. I don't swing that way, sorry.

condition.saying: Short hair may not look as elegant in combat, but it's very simple, huh, ~name~?

case.state: More than you think!

condition.saying: Oh good, yer clean shaven! My darlin' hates gettin' hair stuck in his teeth.

case.state: Gross, Aimee...

condition.saying: I know a blonde girl who can do crazy stuff with her hair. And that does mean all of it.

case.state: Sounds like she's fun!

condition.saying: Why do you even have a vagina? It's not like robots can reproduce that way.

case.state: Because I wanted to be a bit more like a human, okay?

condition.saying: What does a robot even do with that?

case.state: Same thing as you, I guess. Just without babies.

condition.saying: Often you hear jokes about “dumb blondes,” Lady ~name~, however to me you seem of perfectly adequate intellect!

case.state: Oh believe me, I get that all the time...
Less 'removal', more 'not designing hair here'. It's such a hassle.
Why couldn't there be any guys here...
I guess I'll put them over there. Err, toss them.
I'll just toss them there.
I liked those shoes. Oh, well.
Over there they go, then.
Good thing I remembered I have that.
You'll have to try a little harder if you want to see more, ~player~.
Can't believe I almost forgot it.
But honestly? I'm not really complaining.
Take it in, because that's the last thing I take off.
What? You think I'd be ashamed of the body I myself designed?
So, what do you think? I worked pretty hard on this body.
I'll just put them with my shoes.
I guess they'll go with my shoes over there.
With my shoes they go.
Thankfully my shirt and panties basically cover everything else up.
Hah, I bet you thought my shirt was part of my dress.
You're going to have to try a little harder if you want to see more, ~player~.
I chose their size, so hush. The smaller they are, the less fabric I have to use when sewing my dress.
Yeah, yeah, smaller ones are just easier to work with.
Take your shirt off!
Alright, ~name~, let's see what you've got!
Let's see what ~name~'ll choose.
~name~'s up!
Take something good off!
Okay, ~name~, let's see what you've been hiding!
Oh, ~name~'s up?
Take something nice off, ~name~!
If you're taking your pants off, mind turning towards me?
Take something good off so I could have a little more eye candy in here...
Take something good off for the ol' memory banks. Err, figuratively speaking, of course, heh heh...
Alright, ~name~! Let's see what you've got!
Come on, ~name~, take something big off for me.
Give me something to look at, ~name~!
Come on, take something good off.
Take something big off, ~name~.
Woah! Calm down!
Ah! What is that!?
What is that?
Are you okay!?
Wait, no no no!
Don't do it, Aimee!
Don't you dare!
Not again!
Never a dull moment here, huh?
Ooh, a magic trick? I hope it's better than Shadow Man's trick. My neck took so long to fix...
A magic trick? This I got to see!
Don't give up, ~name~!
Come on, ~name~, don't be shy!
All right, ~name~! Let's see what she'll choose!
Alright, ~name~, let's see what you've got!
~name~'s up!
Take something good off!
Okay, ~name~, let's see what you've been hiding!
Oh, ~name~'s up?
Take something nice off, ~name~!
Oh, it's ~name~?
~name~'s up. Shame I don't really swing that way, otherwise I'd probably be a bit more excited.
Take something good off for the ol' memory banks. Err, figuratively speaking, of course, heh heh...
Alright, ~name~! Let's see what you've got!
Cool, a tie! Wait, what happens now?
Kind of weird to take that off last, but I'm not complaining!
The shadow! It covers your face.
Taking off your ~clothing~ after your underwear. Sure.
Kind of weird considering you already took your underwear off, but you do you, ~name~.
Oh, come on.
Choosing that, huh?
You're sure? Maybe not something... else?
Fine. I guess I expected that.
I was hoping for a bit more, but I guess it's a start. A small start, but a start...
I guess I should've expected that. Still...
Oh, that? You sure, ~name~?
I guess you're playing the long game?
Well, it makes sense.
Oh, come on!
If you're going to take that off, take off your ~clothing~... sexily? (Wait, is that possible...?)
Hey, hey! Keep it up and I might just do the same, robot boy!
Yet your eyes shine! Just like mine!
I figured as much.
Makes the most sense to take that off before anything else. Still...
A bit boring...
I'm not saying I can't see why you took that off, but...
Okay, now that that waste of time is over...
We're going to be here all day if this keeps up.
Come on. Don't do this to me!
This is insane. How do you still have small things to take off?
Let's hurry this up, I just remembered I still have some errands to do.
Is this the best you've got? Is this your strongest choice here?
Of course she ran away...
Are we going to play one short now?
Eh?
I thought you looked cute in that hat, Megumin!
Ahahaha!
Eh? What's that?
Nami, I think you dropped something there... wait a minute...
What's that paper? Wait...
You didn't realize?
Taking off your ~clothing~ after your underwear. Sure.
Kind of weird considering what you've taken off, but you go, ~name~.
Oh, come on.
Choosing that, huh?
You're sure? Maybe not something... else?
Fine. I guess I expected that.
I was hoping for a bit more, but I guess it's a start. A small start, but a start...
I guess I should've expected that. Still...
Oh, that? You sure, ~name~?
I guess you're playing the long game?
Well, it makes sense.
No shame in that, Megumin!
Pirate? This is the kind of thing to bring up beforehand! And why did you even have that poster? That's just begging for trouble.
Pirate, huh? Well, I guess if you don't do, well, pirate things like steal or say 'aye' I guess you're okay...
Pirate? I would've never thought you were a pirate in a million years!
Hey, wait! Does that still count?
And that is why I don't wear skirts. Well, not really, but it's one of them.
Heheh, that's why you tailor your own clothes. They fit so much better that way!
I figured as much.
Makes the most sense to take that off before anything else. Still...
A bit boring...
I'm not saying I can't see why you took that off, but...
Okay, now that that waste of time is over...
We're going to be here all day if this keeps up.
Going for the boring option, I see.
You’re more boring than Sheep Man!
Come on. Don't do this to me!
This is insane. How do you still have small things to take off?
Let's hurry this up, I just remembered I still have some errands to do.
Is this the best you've got?
Well, I guess it's not the worst thing in the world to pick...
Oh, you’re taking that off…
Are you sure?
That? Really?
Really? You’re choosing that?
Take something else off, that’s just boring…
Well, it’s a start…
It’s a start, at least…
I can’t say I didn’t expect it, yet I can’t say I’m not disappointed…
Going for the boring option, I see.
Well, it's a start.
It's a start, I guess.
I guess I can call that a start.
One step at a time.
Baby steps.

Let's just move along...
Yeah, yeah, let's just keep going...
What a waste of time...
Move this along, people.
Hah! Wait, is Vesper Woman nearby?
Ahahah! Doesn't look like one of Vesper Woman's bees, but this is something she'd do!
Heheh, okay, who's going to tell her?
I never knew! Besides the fact I didn't detect a heartbeat from you, that is...
I guess it's not the worst thing in the world to pick...
I can’t say I didn’t expect it, yet I can’t say I’m not disappointed…
It’s a start, at least…
Well, it’s a start…
Take something else off, that’s just boring…
Really? You’re choosing that?
That? Really?
Are you sure?

Yeah, yeah, let's just keep going...

Going for the big guns from the get go!
Coming in hot, ~name~!

Alright!

Wait, if she can do that what's stopping me from teleporting home and coming back with new clothes?
Hey! You can't do that!

Alright!
Way to go, ~name~!
Way to spice things up!
A few more rounds like that, and I'll get what I came for!

Um, Amy?

You, Fire Man, Crash Man, and Needle Man all have something in common!
Nevermind then!
Looks like you got what you deserved!
Alright! Let's get back to the game so I can kick ~name~'s butt again!
Hand me some cards so I can beat this sucker again!

There we go!

Nice!

Not really what I expected, although I kind of see why they're not there...

I bet you could give Guts Man a run for his money!
I could imagine myself running my hands across your chest, ~name~...
You look like you could lift Hard Man!
You could just sweep me off my feet...
I like a guy who takes care of himself...
Nice...
Very nice, ~name~...
That'll do nicely...
Yeah, that will do finely...
Oh. Okay then. Well, there's more of you to...?
Ah. Nevermind.
You kind of remind me of Dr. Light.

Oh, ~name~, you're taking that off? In that case, turn a bit towards me...
If it's coming out, mind turning towards me for a bit...
Hey, ~name~, if you're taking your ~clothing~ off, mind turning towards me?
Hmph. Should've done that before, while I was... busy...
Come on, ~name~! Let me see it!
Little ~name~ is practically begging to be let out!
I can already see the bulge, ~name~!
It's so cruel to keep it in there, trapped like a prisoner! It needs fresh air!
O-oh. When I said little ~name~, I didn't actually mean it...
I guess I was being more literal than I thought...
Not what I was expecting...
Hmph. It'll have to do.
(I guess I could just project something from the internet to my eyes...)
I-it's fine, I guess.
Not what I was expecting. No offense to you, ~name~...
I take it you're a grower?
I mean no offense, but... well...
That's it?
Oh. No offense, but nevermind, ~name~.
Nevermind...
Yeah, that'll do.
I could see myself with that...
Yeah, that's nice...
There we go...
That's what I'm talking about.
Alright, ~name~, good for you!
Eye candy is never unappreciated...
Looking good, little ~name~!
W-woah. How do you walk with that?
I'm not sure if I'm even calibrated to take things like that...
Woah! How do you walk with that monster?
Strange. Looks like you have a third leg. Wait. Wait.
Now that is a dick.
Yeah, that's pretty good, ~name~.
It's bigger than a Search Snake! Which I'm realizing sounds like an innuendo!
I didn't even know they could be that size naturally! Wait, it is natural, right?
Why couldn't I have lost after you?
I came looking for copper, and I found gold.
This game is picking up nicely!
This is getting pretty serious!
A-Are you sure you want this to be your first choice, ~name~!?
Is this really going to be your first choice, ~name~!?
Okay, ~name~, let's see them!
Let's see 'em, ~name~!
Let's see what you've been hiding, ~name~!
What's been hiding underneath your ~clothing~ this entire time? Let's find out, ~name~!
This is so unfair! ~name~'s almost fully nude yet I am sitting here, not even down to my underwear.
I get it, Megumin. Sometimes I just don't want to wear one. But I think this is the one time you might want to wear it...
No shame in being small!
Being small has its perks, ~name~! Don't you ever forget it!
Hey! They're like mine!
We should start a club of like-chested ladies such as ourselves.
Always good to see that I'm not the only one with a small chest!
We look like twins! Well, at least in the chest.
Hey, look, same size! Well, relatively speaking.
Small but full of gall!
Yeah, don't show them off...
They're fine, I guess.
Maybe I should've designed mine to be a bit bigger... n-no, what am I saying...
A bit of an overreaction isn't it, Tharja!?
How can you walk with those? At least if I had those I'd be able to move fairly well with my robotic body, what's your excuse?
W-woah.
They're as big as a Met...
How do you walk with those things?
Yeah,
Then again, I really shouldn't complain about me still being in the game.
Are you going to do another trick?
A-Are you sure you want this to be your first choice, ~name~!?
Is this really going to be your first choice, ~name~!?
You're going to bare it for all to see, ~name~?
I wonder if ~name~ is a hair or bare kind of person. Is that weird to ask? Probably in any other place...
Hey, hey! There's no need for violence!
I think she's serious! Turn them back!
Don't make me call Rock in to break you two up!
I could sew that back together for you if you want... well, if I had a sewing machine...
Braver than I, Twilight!
Very unorthodox, yet it makes a bit of sense. I mean, you can't see anything there. Yet.
A-are you okay? That looked... I can't even begin to describe it!
You know, there are much less dangerous ways to do that!
Did you just...? From a bullet...?
I can't stand hair there myself. Although probably for different reasons.
Looks like we have something in common, ~name~!
You take good care of yourself down there, don't you, ~name~?
Nothing like a smooth crotch, huh, ~name~?
I don't like hair there, myself. It's really hard to make realistic synthetic hair, so it either ends up being sandpaper rough or silky smooth...
Personally, I don't get why someone would have hair there. Although I might be biased as hair is pretty hard to replicate for robots...
Do you even look at that place once in a while? It's a mess!
That thing's messier than Rock's room after a week!
You give your crotch less attention than Wily does to his plans!
It's... very... nice? I don't really know what to say, heheh...
She's not Mega Man! I would know!
Oh, um. Well, um... That's... it's... just use the internet. W-wait, no! Don't look it up!
Your hair looks really good, ~name~! And I'm not just saying that because of blonde pride.
Alright, ~name~, you know the rules. Do you?
And yes, that is a word! Anyway, what were we doing?
Hey, you're in that Smash Bros thing, right?
I remember you, ~name~! You look different when you're not being pelted by Mega Buster shots!
Wait a minute! I know you, ~name~! You're from Smash! You look different when you're not getting blasted by Rock!
Wait a minute, I know ~name~! You look different without a Crash Bomb on you at all times.
Oh, I know you, ~name~! I saw you getting beat up by Rock!
Can't you just take them off like a normal person!?
If you hit me, I swear to Asimov there will be a lot of angry Robot Masters here!
I knew I should've brought Leaf Shield!
Hey, hey! Watch it! Robot Masters are hard to reproduce, you know!
Watch it! I'm bullet resistant, not proof!
That cape looked so cute on you, I kind of wish you didn't lose. Kind of.
Where'd you get that cape anyway?
What's going on!?
How are you doing that?
What are you...?
No matter how dark this seems to get, there will be light!
Oh, you're choosing that?
I thought you looked cute in your ~clothing~, ~name~!
I didn't even realize you didn't take your ~clothing~ off yet, ~name~!
Oh, you still have small things to take off, huh...
I can't believe you still have little things to take off, ~name~. When will you run out!?
I thought you looked cute in your ~clothing~, name~. Err, not that I... you know what I mean...
This is getting ridiculous! I'm here, naked as the day I was built, and ~name~ here still has ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~!
Tell me, how do you get in? I hear it's really difficult, but my brother Rock's already in it.
How did you do that!?
Thanks, but I don't drink.
Oh, how far you've fallen, ~name~.
I said it as a joke, but now I'm kind of disappointed...
Let's just keep going so I can put ~name~ in ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ place. On my level, that is
Oh, Asimov, this is going to be a long night if we keep this up...
Oh, so that's the forfeit, huh? Can't say that's not kind of hot...
Alright, ~name~, give us a show!
Let's see how you handle that Z-Saber.
Maybe focus on me for a while?
When you get started, you should look over here once in a while. A while is 3 seconds, by the way, heheh.
Feel free to look over here if you need some help, heheh...
If I knew you'd lose this badly, I might've played better!
Oh, now you want to do that?
Oh. Well, I think I owe you an apology, Kazuma...
W-wait, does that mean I'll also have to...? Come to think of it, that doesn't seem so bad...
Wait. What's a Z-Saber? Why did I say that?
Now this is what I came here to see!
This is why I'm here!
If you need some 'help', feel free to look this way.
Ever need some 'motivation', look over here once in a while.
Hey, ~name~, if you need some 'motivation', feel free to look over here.
Maybe I should've slowed down so I got a chance to see this...
You're really going at it, huh, ~name~?
This right here is why I decided to come here.
This is infinitely better than the internet...
Looks like ~name~'s having a good time over there.
Mind looking over here once in a while?
Look at me, ~name~, it'll help you finish faster if that's what you want...
What I wouldn't give to be able to just go over there...
~name~ looks close...
Don't hit the dress!
If you're going to do that, point it somewhere else!
Don't you dare hit my dress, ~name~!
Come on, ~name~, let it all out...
I can see you're close, ~name~. Don't hold back...
Hey! Watch the dr- wait. You didn't cum?
Hey! You almost hit my dress!
You're lucky you didn't get any of that in my dress! It's really hard to get out!
Watch the dress, ~name~!
So, ~name~, who were you thinking of?
Watch it! You almost hit me with that!
You should've seen the look on your face, ~name~.
Not going to lie, that was pretty hot, ~name~.
That's so hot...
It feels like Fire Man is in this room...
If he teleported in, why didn't I see a beam?
Where did you come from?
Heheh, I can't wait to see where this leads...
Woah! Are you okay!?
If you're damaged, I could try and help!
Rules are rules, ~name~!
Come on, ~name~, rules are rules!
Well, ~name~, you knew what you signed on for. Right?
And another one bites the dust!
Wait, where did she go?
What just happened!?
What happened to you? And your hair!
Normally, I'd say the balloon would pop, but with you, Pinkie, there's really no telling, is there?
That's... new!
Hmph. I hear 'Shower Tempo' and all I can think about is my friend, Tempo, in the shower...
Shower Tempo, huh? Maybe I should start trying that!
Would you believe I never thought of that? Maybe I'll have a bit more time for myself, then...
I don't think even Cut Man could garden those!
Where did those come from?
Still no beam when he teleported out. How did he do that?
You know, I like the part where I taunt you better than the part where you actually do the thing.
Okay, now go do that over there.
Do your thing over there. Maybe ~player~'ll take more of an interest in you than myself, no offense.
You, uh, having fun there?
Hey! Don't get the floor wet!
Careful! I'll have to clean that floor! Wait, no I don't.
You're pretty loud, ~name~.
Sounds like ~name~'s having fun, heheh...
You okay there, ~name~? Sounds like you're more than okay, actually...
No, she did not use her hands, like a smart girl she used a tool! But just the same!
You're, um, really getting into it, huh, ~name~?
So, um, ~name~'s pretty loud, huh?
Mind keeping it down, ~name~? No offense...
I'm trying to concentrate, and ~name~'s just making mac and cheese over there.
Make breakfast, I guess.
Hah! I guess I was wrong before, huh?
Hey! You almost hit me!
I guess
What was that!?
What a light show!
I could always call in Eddie and have him bring in a mop, if you'd like?
You got the floor all wet...
And who has to clean the floor? Oh, wait, it's not me. Nevermind then.
You alright there, ~name~?
Anyone got a wet floor sign? What? It's a legitimate hazard!
Well, rules are rules, I guess!
Oh no, whatever will I do?
I've given everything I can! There are no heroes left in man...

condition.saying: Is this how robots perform an oil change?

case.state: Ha, ha. Very funny.
Well, at least I'm not the first!
Oh no, whatever will I do?
Guess I have to! Not that I'm complaining.

condition.saying: Should I take a step back? Oil is quite difficult to clean.

case.state: Isn't that the truth. Oil Man is the bane of my existence... well, him and Wily. Wait, was that supposed to be a joke?
Here we go, then.
Watch and learn, people...
Never done this with an 'audience', heheh...

condition.saying: Clank clank clank clank clank clank clank...

case.state: Very funny. I almost forgot to laugh.

condition.saying: This is way more awkward when I recognize you...

case.state: Yeah, I could see how it'd be awkward, heheh...
Heheh, didn't think I'd do this in front of total strangers... ah, who am I kidding. That's why I signed up...
Like what you see, ~player~?
Heh, I don't really get to do this often... I'm just so busy...
I really needed this...
I never knew how much I needed this, heheh...
This is just amazing...
Didn't think a robot could do this, huh, ~player~?
Oh, Asimov, this is great...
Why doesn't Tempo decide to do this?
Wow, I really needed this...
Oh, Asimov this is amazing...
I should do this more often... much more often...
Why don't I do this more often?
I wish Bass was here... at least I'd have something to look at, this is a chick fest!
I'm so close... I'm gonna...
I'm about to...
I... I'm getting close...
I'm gonna...
Getting real close here...
If I keep this up, I'm gonna...
Is Heat Man in here? Torch Man? Flame Man? Fire Man? Magm- you get the point...
Who turned up the heat?
I'm getting really close here...
C-cumming...!
Hold on, let me just clean myself up... can't stand it when I get messy...
Wait a minute, let me clean up... and yes, I do keep a box of tissues with me at all times...
Luckily, I always keep a box of tissues in my dress...
I needed that... I should do it more often, heheh...
Shame I don't have more time to do that...
But where's the fun in that?
I should clean up after myself... well, the floor, that is...
Where's Eddie when you need him? He'd bring me a mop...
Oh yeah, I could just call him in. I don't really want him to see me like this, though...
You know, I could just run some programming magic and feel pleasure automatically.
Well, anyway, that was fun. Let's go home. What do you mean it isn't over yet?
You know, I could go for a 'round two' of sorts.
Did I forget to take the trash out?
I'm not sure what to do now.
Is today garbage day? No, garbage day is ~day~, not... wait...
Did I remember to get the groceries?
Nobody told me there'd be so much waiting around here...
Can I put my clothes back on? They're getting wrinkled.
Can you guys hurry it up, I just remembered I still have things to do at home...
Robot brain wins again! Undefeated, 200X to 20XX!
Putting the 'Master' in Robot Master since 200X!
I was so close to winning! Well, good job, ~name~. You've earned this win, I guess...
Oh well! Good job, ~name~! I almost beat you, too!
Jokes on you, I guess, I didn't bring anything for this exact reason! Wait, where's my... uh oh...
At least I could just teleport home... and maybe say Toad Man was operating in the region...
I knew it! You no good little...! If there was no First Law you'd be sorry you thief!
You did a super job wrapping things up! And I'm not just saying that because I have to!
I guess I'll see you around. We accomplished a lot together! It was fun! Take care!
Well, that was really fun. Good job, ~name~! Sorry I can't stick around, I gotta roll.
Wow, that was fun. Maybe I could stick ar- hm? Oh. Sorry, Dr. Light's calling. I've gotta go. See you, ~name~!
Ice Man is visiting for repairs, so if I did leave the oven on...
Oh wait! Ice Man is at the Lab for repairs!
Then again, there's something like, 3 of the same person, so I guess it can't be too hard.
I heard a veteran Assist Trophy member was trying to get in for years. Not even a letter of denial back. The nerve of them!
Hey, wait a minute. I've been using an older subroutine for this. So that's why I've been losing!
Well, it's either that or bad luck. I hope it's the former.
Well, you can't see them, but just trust me on this one.
Wait, was it Ice Man or Fire Man?
I was worried for a second!
Oh ye gods! My roast is ruined!
I should call in and tell them... but then they'd see me... I'm sure they're fine...
